name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Single Tab Manager: Focus & Streamline Browsing by Limiting Tabs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically closes all tabs except for the first one.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your browser with Single Tab Manager, a lightweight Chrome extension developed by Nikita Kostin. Designed for users who want to limit distractions or conserve system resources, this extension ensures that only the first tab remains openâ€”automatically closing any additional tabs.

Features:
- Automatically closes any tab opened beyond the first.
- Option to enable or disable the extension with a simple switch.
- Clean, modern interface for effortless management.
- Lightweight, minimal impact on browser performance.
- Whether you want to focus on a single task or reduce memory usage, Single Tab Manager makes 
  your browsing experience simpler and more focused.
